mapper.select: SELECT h_num AS hNum, h_name AS hName, h_count AS hCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM hashtags WHERE h_name = #{hName}
SELECT h_num AS hNum, h_name AS hName, h_count AS hCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM hashtags WHERE h_num = #{hNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE hashtags SET h_count = h_count - 1 WHERE h_num = #{hNum} AND h_count > 0
mapper.select: SELECT h_num AS hNum, h_name AS hName, h_count AS hCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM hashtags WHERE h_count > 0 ORDER BY h_count DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT h_num AS hNum, h_name AS hName, h_count AS hCount, created_at AS createdAt FROM hashtags WHERE h_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY h_count DESC, h_name ASC LIMIT 20

SELECT h.h_num AS hNum, h.h_name AS hName, h.h_count AS hCount, h.created_at AS createdAt FROM hashtags h INNER JOIN post_hashtags ph ON h.h_num = ph.h_num WHERE ph.p_num = #{pNum} ORDER BY h.h_name ASC
SELECT p_num FROM post_hashtags WHERE h_num = #{hNum} ORDER BY ph_num DESC
SELECT ph.p_num FROM post_hashtags ph INNER JOIN hashtags h ON ph.h_num = h.h_num WHERE h.h_name = #{hName} ORDER BY ph.ph_num DESC
